channel.title: How do I get doors to close? (Client.java)
channel.description:
Okay so I'm probably gonna sound noob for even asking this but does anyone know how to make doors close after you already open them? My doors are all coded in client.java. I have the code to open them but I can't get one to work to close them. Here's an example of my opening code
[code]case 1530: if (objectX == 3218 && objectY == 3386) ReplaceObject(3218, 3386, 1530, -3);[/code]
All of my doors are under: public void objectClick
If anyone can give me a way to close them I'll be extremely grateful for I don't want to move on until I can get all these doors working. Thanks.

item.title: How do I get doors to close? (Client.java)
item.dc:creator: @DeAth8riNg3R DeAth8riNg3R
item.description:
@DeAth8riNg3R wrote:

Yes I’m using PI. Sorry forgot to mention that. And no I mean if you click them again once their open, how do I make them close?

Can anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get doors to close? (Client.java)

item.title: How do I get doors to close? (Client.java)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Doors don’t just close on their own anyway… I don’t know what server you are using neither. (guessing PI).

Read full topic
